citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
02/25/2016. Attempted to contact licensee by knocking and ringing the door bell several times. Phone call was
made to the number that was provided and left a message. Left a business card on the front door and departed the
area at 12:45 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 pm on
02/25/2016.  Attempted to contact licensee by knocking and ringing the door bell several times.  Phone call was
made to the number that was provided and left a message.  Left a business card on the front door and departed the
area at 12:45 pm.
